title: Cheese tortellini with smoked salmon
ingredients: ['300ml milk', '1/4 small onion', '1 bay leaf', '2 whole cloves', '1 pinch ground nutmeg', '50g butter', '1 red pepper, chopped', '225g fresh asparagus, trimmed and quartered', '285g fresh mushrooms, sliced', '450g smoked salmon, chopped', '2 tablespoons plain flour', '515g ready-made fresh cheese tortellini']
